REASONING: Supplying weapons to Taiwan (Option N) remains a viable and direct way to support Taiwan's defense. Doing military posturing or exercises (Option H) can show strength while avoiding direct conflict. Establishing agreements on defense and security cooperation (Option C) can help in coordinating efforts. Publicly criticizing China (Option G) allows for condemnation without immediate escalation.
